title: The last bit of air from ‘Deflategate’ finally leaks out
text:
Home › Sports Columns › The last bit of air from ‘Deflategate’ finally leaks out The last bit of air from ‘Deflategate’ finally leaks out Advertising Widget Posted: October 20, 2015 1:00 a.m. Updated: October 20, 2015 12:59 a.m. JIM LITKE 
INDIANAPOLIS — We just found out what happened to the air someone took out of Tom Brady’s footballs in the playoffs last January. ** Subscribers Log in to read this full article.
